Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoSure Star Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GlucoSure Star Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoSure Star Blood Glucose Monitoring System for measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, or forearm
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, or forearm for use by individuals with diabetes or healthcare professionals as an aid in monitoring diabetes mellitus
